meta-review.comment: Tetris Effect Connected offers a breathtaking journey through a mesmerizing world of falling blocks, accompanied by an exquisite soundtrack. The addition of engaging multiplayer modes enhances the timeless experience of Tetris, making it a must-play for both solo players and competitive enthusiasts. Whether you seek meditative solace or thrilling challenges, Tetris Effect Connected has something for everyone. So, buckle up and get ready to embark on a colorful, trippy adventure with your favorite geometric shapes.
